attributes.action: Review the laws on Cannabis use and discuss the decriminalization of Cannabis
attributes.additional_details:
The decriminalization of Cannabis, the review of health benefits and consequences from the plant.
 To discuss benefits the Government can produce from the plant, for example ; Taxing the sale and growth of the plant.
  To take a look at how succesful the Netherlands policy has been.
 To discuss whether Cannabis is a ' Gateway Drug '
